about_the_game:
Lost and stranded on a mysterious island the player searches for a way out. Not everything is at it seems however as the island is inhabited by a violent cult who stop at nothing to hunt down and kill all outsiders.

Based off classic survivor horror, players will explore the island, solve puzzles, collect keys and fight numerous disturbing enemies with various weapons ranging from melee weapons to firearms. Along the way they will discover audio diaries, video tapes, and notes detailing the events leading up to the downfall of the island.

content_descriptors.notes: There is a lot of blood, death and violence in this game

short_description: Face the Dread, Survive the Night. An island has seemingly appeared just overnight in the middle of the ocean. Lost and stranded, the player searches for a way out but finds the island inhabited by a violent locals who stop at nothing to kill all outsiders.
